Detailed Description

The global keyboard hook. This can be used to globally capture keyboard input.

Member Function Documentation

delegate bool Tibia.KeyboardHook.KeyboardHookHandler ( Keys  key  ) 

Delegate for handling a key down event.

Parameters:
key The key that was pressed. Check Control, Shift, Alt, and Win for modifiers.
Returns:
True if you want the key to pass through (be recognized for the app), False if you want it to be trapped (app never sees it).

static bool Tibia.KeyboardHook.Enable (  )  [static]

Start the keyboard hook.

Returns:
True if no exceptions.

static bool Tibia.KeyboardHook.Disable (  )  [static]

Disable keyboard hooking.

Returns:
True if disabled correctly.

static string Tibia.KeyboardHook.KeyToString ( Keys  key  )  [static]

Return a string representation of the given key based on current modifiers.

Parameters:
key 
Returns:

Add a HookHandler delegate to this to activate hotkeys.
